personal_info.summary: I am military of the Air Force Peruvian, specialist in avionic. Optionally I studied in a self-taught and empirical way programming (08 years), I am curious and I like to solve problems. I implement in my work (Air Force Peruvian) some projects of innovation and automatization.

responsibilities: Designed many applications in Java: a emulator of a game role, solution of bugs in sources of another code, app for decompiling a type of file special.
Designed and modified some apps in ActionScript 2.
Implementation of scripts in PHP and MySQL with systems of micro-payments.
Creation of apps of automation for solution of problems of human processes.
Innovation in development of a simulator of training basic for a system of weapon MANPAD in Unity3D with immersion VR.
Designed and developed a website for management of personnel with different features in PHP, MySQL, for the COVID-19.
Development of Interface for Device Biometric ZKTeco in Java.
Implementation and development of a system of control entry and exit through a website, requesting information to API Reniec.
Designed and developed systems domotics (open door with keyboard or fingerprint) with Arduino.
Implementation and development of applications of automation of large or difficult human administrative processes.

education.institution: Escuela Suboficiales Fuerza Aerea Del Peru
